purpose: Complete reproducibility dataset for D0 trial entry and audit

computation_formulas.handle_gap_on_zero: divide by max(1, abs(gap_on)) to avoid division by zero
computation_formulas.r_t_definition: r_t = r_{t-1} + 1 if g_t >= g_hi else 0

signal_p99_anchor.anchor_value_note: Computed ONCE from full dataset, shared across ALL configs

configurations.shuffle_seed_note: Fixed at 9999 for all g_hi tests
Fixed at 9999 for all g_hi tests
Fixed at 9999 for all g_hi tests

campaign_metadata.mode_runs_definition: Each seed produces 2 mode-runs: 1 ON + 1 SHUFFLE
campaign_metadata.run_dir_note: Each mode-run is stored in a separate run_dir with temporal_run_summary.json + temporal_tick_evidence.jsonl

off_mode.reason: V0.6.3 tests ON (real temporal structure) vs SHUFFLE (permuted structure) only

v0_6_1_reference.description: Tested ON vs OFF vs SHUFFLE to understand signal distribution vs temporal alignment effects
v0_6_1_reference.key_finding: OFF mode (no signal, fixed cost) showed different extinction pattern than SHUFFLE (signal permuted). This led to V0.6.3 refinement: ON vs SHUFFLE (permutation-only control) to isolate temporal structure effect.

off_mode.note: If D0 requires OFF comparison data, both evidence files are available and parseable at paths listed above.
